alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Bedford; Campbell; Franklin; Henry; Patrick; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 5:58PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of western Campbell, northern Pittsylvania, Bedford, Henry, southwestern Amherst, Franklin and eastern Patrick Counties, the City of Martinsville and the City of Lynchburg through 630 PM EST... At 556 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers with strong winds along a line extending from near Sedalia to near Burnt Chimney to near Ararat. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, weak trees and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lynchburg... Martinsville... Bedford... Rocky Mount... Altavista... Stuart... and Hurt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
